messageSet.name: main loading tips
messageSet.message: if your play area is too small, go to options and try one of suggested actions~ ~ 1. use horizontal scaling to make the play area appear larger~ ~ 2. use "joystick movement" to stand in one place and move with joysticks~ ~ note: the game is developed with roomscale movement in mind and it is highly encouraged to play it this way

the game is highly customizable~ ~ to adjust the difficulty, make the game harder or easier, select game modifiers from the main menu~ ~ the options menu allows adjusting various aspects of the game: controls, play area buffer, haptics and more

the game will keep you within the designated play area~ ~ all the space beyond walkable surfaces might be outside the play area~ ~ avoid going through bars, jumping over gaps, waving your arms above chasms
if you feel dizzy, unwell, take a break~ ~ before you start the game, you always have an access to the shortened accessibility options~ ~ for more, check the options menu
